ygData.subject: Re: Hullo!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all!  I also am a working mother, I put in alot of hours at work and then come home to take care of two children (12 and 9) not that they take alot of
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all! I also am a working mother, I put in alot of hours at work and
then come home to take care of two children (12 and 9) not that they take
alot of babysitting, but it does get hetic at times. I usually get settled
down around 9 or 10 to play. I have had nights where I got off the game
just in time to jump in the shower for work (very long days). But the game
is so much fun I just can not help myself. I am usually up by 4 in the
morning and that is the time I check my email and surf a bit for new
information on whatever. I would not change it though because I have so
much fun on this game!
----- Original Message -----
From: Suzanne Johnson <katannah@...>
To: <EQ_women@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, June 18, 1999 10:29 PM
Subject: [EQ_women] Hullo!


> From: Suzanne Johnson <katannah@...>
>
>
> I play Sara, a 13th level ranger, on Povar. I was gratified to find our
> "own" spot!
>
>
> I am a working mother, so I don't get to play that often. How does
> everyone else manage?
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Got an opinion?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.
